text:
Los Angeles: Former California governor Arnold Schwarzenegger has lashed out at US President Donald Trump's rebuke of American intelligence agencies during a news conference with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

Trump stunned the world on Monday by shying away from criticising the Russian leader for Moscow's actions to undermine the election and cast doubt on US intelligence agencies, prompting calls by some US lawmakers for tougher sanctions and other actions to punish Russia.

"President Trump, I just saw your press conference with President Putin and it was embarrassing," Schwarzenegger said in a Facebook video on Monday, unshaven and appearing distraught.

"I mean you stood there like a little wet noodle, like a little fanboy.
title: Schwarzenegger calls Trump a 'little wet noodle' after Putin news conference

meta_data.title: Trump-Putin Summit: Arnold Schwarzenegger labels Trump a 'little wet noodle' after Putin summit
meta_data.description: The former governor of California has claimed the President "sold out" the nation as well as its intelligence and justice systems, after the US President met with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

og.description: The former California governor, who has repeatedly tangled with Trump, said the President "sold out" the nation as well as its intelligence and justice systems.
og.title: Schwarzenegger calls Trump a 'little wet noodle' after Putin news conference

meta_data.parsely-title: Schwarzenegger calls Trump a 'little wet noodle' after Putin news conference
